db:info.db:title: Qt Sensors - SensorGesture QML Type example

db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates the use of SensorGesture QML type.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = qmlsensorgestures QT += quick SOURCES = main.cpp
OTHER_FILES = \ $$files(*.qml)
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/sensors/qmlsensorgestures INSTALLS += target
RESOURCES += \ qml.qrc
